name: Maximum Cell Range
summary: The Maximum Cell Range feature increases maximum cell range in sparsely populated

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.specialSubframePattern
parameters.description: If this attribute is set to 5, it cannot be used in                                 combination with nB = 4T on MO Paging as defined in 3GPP TS                                     36.213. The round trip time at                                     EUtranCellTDD.cellRange together with                                 switching time must be less than the time available in special                                 subframe.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010967 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4010967 MO instance.
